Erase the concept of "us" vs. "them" - The idea of categorizing people into groups based on their race, ethnicity, religion, or nationality has been a root cause of many conflicts throughout history. If I had the power to erase one thing from existence, it would be the mentality of "us" vs. "them". This would allow people to see each other as individuals rather than as members of a particular group, fostering empathy, understanding, and unity.

Erase the stigma surrounding mental health - Mental health issues affect millions of people worldwide, yet there is still a significant stigma surrounding them. If I had the power to erase one thing from existence, it would be the social taboo surrounding mental health. This would encourage people to seek help without fear of judgment or discrimination, leading to better mental health outcomes and a more supportive society.

Erase the concept of "time" - Time is a human construct that can be both a blessing and a curse. If I had the power to erase one thing from existence, it would be the concept of time. This would allow people to live in the present moment without worrying about the past or future, fostering a greater appreciation for life and a more mindful approach to existence.

Erase the notion of "right" and "wrong" - The idea of moral absolutism can lead to rigidity and intolerance, causing conflict and division. If I had the power to erase one thing from existence, it would be the notion of "right" and "wrong". This would allow people to approach ethical dilemmas with empathy and nuance, recognizing that what is right for one person may not be right for another.

Erase the concept of "ownership" - The idea of ownership can lead to exploitation and inequality, as people and resources are seen as commodities to be controlled. If I had the power to erase one thing from existence, it would be the concept of "ownership". This would promote a more equitable and sustainable approach to resource management, recognizing that everything is interconnected and interdependent.
